description:
The shadows surround Ushio, Sou, and Shinpei. However, their primary target is the girl. Meanwhile, Mio works with Totsumura to chase down Shiori`s shadow. Hizuru, Ryunosuke, and Nezu become witnesses to Mio`s pursuit. Just as Shinpei and his friends thought they have overcome the peril, an unexpected person appears to them.
Source: Disney+
